bibl.title: Rafał Taubenschlag and Roman Law in Poland during Real Socialism.
bibl.note: Roman law and communism. - Roman law in the People's Republic of Poland. - Roman law in Poland between the two World Wars. - Rafał Taubenschlag's career at the Jagellonian University. - Rafał Taubenschlag's career after World War II at the University of Warsaw. - Other personalities and the debate on the importance of teaching Roman law. - Latin regulae iuris and the juridical practice in Poland.

bibl.title: Classics and Communism. Greek and Latin behind the Iron Curtain.

bibl.seg: Witold Wołodkiewicz, Rafał Taubenschlag and Roman Law in Poland during Real Socialism.
Györgi Karsai, Gábor Klaniczay, David Movrin & Elżbieta Olechowska (edd.), Classics and Communism. Greek and Latin behind the Iron Curtain (Ljubljana - Budapest - Warsaw, 2013) pp. 237-256.

Roman law and communism. - Roman law in the People's Republic of Poland. - Roman law in Poland between the two World Wars. - Rafał Taubenschlag's career at the Jagellonian University. - Rafał Taubenschlag's career after World War II at the University of Warsaw. - Other personalities and the debate on the importance of teaching Roman law. - Latin regulae iuris and the juridical practice in Poland.
